text:
June 4, 1959
Dear Colleague:
By voice vote on June 3, the House Committee decided not
to act on ETV legislation during this session of Congress.
They intend to study both the legislation and ETV itself
more closely and to consider this matter again after the
facts are gathered from direct observation in the field.
A Congressional trip to ETV installations is being planned.
There will be no bill passed this session. However, there
is still life in the plan.
RFS:eb
